product_name: Giro Hoxton LF Bike Gloves - Men's
long_description: For city style, exceptional fit and integrated touchscreen technology, you can't beat the men's full-fingered, merino-wool Giro Hoxton LF Bike Gloves. Uppers are made from New Zealand MAPP(R) merino wool, which is naturally water repellent yet can absorb perspiration without letting you feel damp and uncomfortable. Merino wool also breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. Palms are synthetic suede in a Super Fit(TM) Engineered 3-panel design. Conductive fibers in the fingertips let you use a touchscreen mobile device with the gloves on. Gloves feature a highly absorbent microfiber wiping surface. Low-profile rip-and-stick closure on top of wrist; stitched pull tab underneath. Giro Hoxton LF Bike Gloves for men have no padding.
